docstr:
`SLEEP` — Sleep for the specified number of seconds

### Description
Calling this subroutine causes the process to pause for `SECONDS` seconds.



### Syntax
`CALL SLEEP(SECONDS)`


### Arguments

     
.






### Example

     ```


program test_sleep

  call sleep(5)

end

```

     

### Standard
GNU extension



### Class
Subroutine
